title: Impeachment, Then and Now
description: Cass R. Sunstein talks about “Impeachment: A Citizen’s Guide” and “Can It Happen Here?”; and Kathryn Hughes discusses “Victorians Undone.”
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
